page.title: 08SHOPPING IN HALE BARNS.
page.content: The second major shopping district in this Survey area is that centred around a precinct in Hale Barns. This is a popular area with shoppers and businesspeople coming from as far afield as Lymm and Wilmslow. The precinct boasts excellent car parking, toilets, flower beds and seats; it is generally litter free. There is, however, only a small range of shops thus busy mothers and older people have to traval afar to complete a weeks shopping. The one bus service is insufficient for demend and private transport has to be relied upon. This is a wealthy and peaceful area with few facilities for young people apart from one youth club. It was agreed that Hale Barns is primarily a residential area and that there would be nothing to be gained from promoting the shopping area as it exists today.
